About Me

BIO

My name is Habby and I love the technical and logical as much as I love the creative. I’ve worked on both sides of the spectrum, including as a Software Engineer Intern at a startup as well as a Production Assistant at Theatre Companies and Music Festivals. As a writer, dramas are my jam. I love raw, character driven stories people can relate to that make you laugh while you’re crying. I truly enjoy crafting stories and hope to do it for as long as I can. No matter what, I work hard to allow all my passions to reach their fullest potential.
